https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oWlLj4JZM9qIoH6Cb3Y4943jpEZ.jpg A drama that looks back on the Harlem Renaissance from the perspective of an elderly, black writer who meets a gay teenager in a New York homeless shelter. Brother to Brother
